sense.def:
To be expelled from a school or organization
pomeni uradno biti izključen iz šole ali organizacije zaradi grdega vedenja.

seg.quote: He had been expelled from his previous school for stealing.

sense.def:
To be expelled from a place
pomeni biti prisiljen zapustiti neki kraj, ponavadi z grožnjo nasilja.

seg.quote: Peasants were expelled from their villages.
Water is sucked in at one end and expelled at the other.
